name: Citrine Resurrection
description:
//------------SCRIPTOR'S GRATITUDE------------//

Syoudre here, I would like to thank Bullet Hell Artistry # 3 for giving me the chance to finally make my
debut, I really hope you enjoy this script that I made, after a hundred of experimentation and nearly a
year of coding in Danmakufu, I am happy to present this script for everyone to play publicly. I really
dont have much to say anything else in this part, so I hope you enjoy!

//------------OTHERS------------//
Pressing C while having 100 Spirit or more makes Sumireko fire off an special attack, grazing a bullet
gives you 2 Spirit points so higher difficulties makes it easier to increase to 200 but only if you take
a risk for that, 200 Spirit makes the attack able to delete bullets as well.

Pressing Up and Down keys on the Difficulty selection lets you alter the lives count you start with on
the script, there are no penalities for it

I got the word "Gen'ya" because I searched up Lotus Land Story's stage 1 and it gave me 幻野 which
when I google translated, gave me Gen'ya

//------------LASTLY...------------//
If there's any issues with the script, please contact my Discord, Syoudre#8210 or my Twitter @TonitruaVolt
if there was any problems and I will be sure to help you out on an issues

Sumireko and Orange portraits and cut-ins are all made by Dairi.
Pixiv link: https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/4920496

Sumireko Sprite by ZUN.

Hong Meiling sprite by NYAGAKIYA (or KMAP), edited by me so it can have Orange's colors(I could not find anything else).

Alternative Decoration Battle is composed by Orphen Nightford from Paradise of Boundaries.
Youtube link: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7v2DfwaQrEWt7WXzDgcLew

Graze, player shoot, summon sound effects, Orange fruit and Baton/Staff/Stick sprites by me.

I swear there is no virus on this one, the files are open-source you can check if you want to
